synopsis.native: In occasione del trentennale di Io speriamo che me la cavo e l’Oscar alla carriera a Lina Wertmuller, regista del film, Adriano Pantaleo, oggi attore affermato, decide di andare a ritrovare i suoi ex-compagni e piccoli attori di allora. Il racconto delle loro vite e del film diventano occasione per raccontare Napoli e il sud e capire se anche loro “se la sono cavata”.
synopsis.english: In most parts of the world, school is a crucial developmental environment in which to grow, form and find self-actualization. Then there are some places where school saves your life. The mission of the nonprofit organization Still I Rise is to solve the global school crisis by emancipating the most discriminated against, poor and vulnerable children through a cutting-edge educational model that aims to provide excellent education, free of charge, to all the children in the world.
